texto: through retirement 3.1.27 life cycle model framework of processes and activities concerned with the life cycle, which can be organized into stages, acting as a common reference for communication and understanding 3.1.28 operational concept verbal and graphic statement of an organization’s assumptions or intent in regard to an operation or series of operations of a system or a related set of systems Note 1 to entry: The operational concept is designed to give an overall picture of the operations using one or more specific systems, or set of related systems, in the organization’s operational environment from the users’ and operators’ perspective. See also concept of operations (3.1.13). 5 ©
